data.name: ContactUsMessage
data.value: Thank you for your decision to complete and provide your Microsoft Deployment Summary. If you are unable to complete this form in one session, you can save your information by clicking the "Draft" option at the bottom of every page.

data.name: ConsultantInfoMessage
data.value: In case you need assistance during this process, contact your license consultant {{ConsultantName}} at the following phone number {{ConsultantPhoneNumber}} or email address {{ConsultantEmailAddress}}

data.value: The search did not throw results

data.name: LabelMessageMDSWelcome
data.value: Welcome to the Microsoft Deployment Summary. The information provided in this document will help us identify your current licensing status, with the purpose of helping your company optimize license usage and follow good practices in the administration of software assets.

data.name: WithoutLeadId
data.value: Please copy the correct URL because there isn't a Lead ID

data.name: WrongUserPassword
data.value: Wrong User and/or Password, please verify

data.name: Option1ForSurverQuestion1
data.value: a. Our company has a proactive and consistent license management policy. We are correctly licensed and we believe we will not benefit by following this process.

data.name: Option1ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: a. Improve my financial efficiencies in relation to Software licensing.

data.name: Option2ForSurverQuestion1
data.value: b. I am concerned about the privacy of my company information.

data.name: Option2ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: b. Reduce cyber security risks through the enhancement of my licensing and technology products.

data.name: Option2ForSurverQuestion4
data.value: My comments and concerns were addressed

data.name: Option3ForSurverQuestion1
data.value: c. I do not consider that is a suitable service for the current situation of my business.

data.name: Option3ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: c. Prevent potential penalties by audits, government raids or entities in charge of protecting intellectual property.

data.name: Option3ForSurverQuestion3
data.value: c. The user of the technology to be licensed

data.name: Option3ForSurverQuestion4
data.value: Responses to my questions were appropriate and clearly understood.

data.name: Option4ForSurverQuestion1
data.value: d. I have the impression that participating in this process will generate additional costs or expenses to my company.

data.name: Option4ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: d. Identify if my licenses are legitimate

data.name: Option4ForSurverQuestion4
data.value: I was informed about the scope, and expectations of this service, as well as the information required about my company in the process

data.name: Option5ForSurverQuestion1
data.value: e. I do not have the time or resources to dedicate to this process

data.name: Option5ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: e. Get a better understanding of the Software life cycle and the licensing clover.

data.name: Option6ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: f. Understand the different licensing and intellectual property regulations and risks that exist in my local market or those markets where my company operates.

data.name: Option7ForSurverQuestion2
data.value: g. Achieve better and more rapid Software licensing negotiations.

data.name: SurveyIntro
data.value: You are on this page because you selected the option "I am Not interested" in the previous screen. In case you did this by mistake, please press Cancel to go back to the previous screen. In case you have changed your mind about participating in this process, please help us by answering the following questions:

data.name: SurveyQuestion1
data.value: 1. What is the main reason for deciding to not participate?

data.name: SurveyQuestion1Empty
data.value: Please select an answer for question 1

data.name: SurveyQuestion1OptionOtherEmpty
data.value: Please enter the answer for the selected option in question 1

data.name: SurveyQuestion2
data.value: 2. What reasons caught your interest for receiving licensing and Compliance advice?

data.name: SurveyQuestion2Empty
data.value: Please select an answer for question 2

data.name: SurveyQuestion2OptionOtherEmpty
data.value: Please enter the answer for the selected option in question 2

data.name: SurveyQuestion3
data.value: 3. According to your experience, who should be responsible for the software license management?

data.name: SurveyQuestion3Empty
data.value: Please select an answer for question 3

data.name: SurveyQuestion3OptionOtherEmpty
data.value: Please enter the answer for the selected option in question 3

data.name: SurveyQuestion4
data.value: 4. How was your experience in your telephonic interaction with our license consultant? (Note that 1 is the lowest rating and 5 is the highest rating)

data.name: SurveyQuestion4Empty
data.value: Please rate all options for question 4

data.name: SurveyQuestion5
data.value: 5. Do you have any additional comments about this experience or the purpose of this initiative?

data.name: SurveyQuestionResponseMessage
data.value: Your decision of not participating has already been communicated. If you decide participating in this campaign, please contact your license consultant {{ConsultantName}} to the following phone number {{ConsultantPhoneNumber}} or the following email address {{ConsultantEmailAddress}}

data.value: Additional Information for Developers Partners of Microsoft

data.value: Does your organization develops basic or custom applications?

data.value: What type of applications do you develop?

data.value: What are the Microsoft tools used by your organization for development?

data.name: LabelLoginMessage
data.value:
This website is for Microsoft customers who are participating in a Microsoft Software Asset Management consulting program. Through this program, customers will receive guidance and advise from a Microsoft software licensing expert on how to optimize their usage and licensing of Microsoft software. Participating customers should have received unique login user name and password in order to access the site.

If you have not received your login user name and password or should you have questions, please reach out to your Microsoft Software Asset Management consultant.

data.name: WrongUserAccess
data.value: You don't have a Microsoft Deployment Summary draft, please search in your e-mail address for the instructions to access this application.

data.name: ForgetPassBodyText
data.value:
Dear. {User Name},

 

{Company Name}

You recently requested to recovery your password for your Microsoft Deployment Summary account. Please use the following credentials to log on in to the site:

 

URL: {Customer Link}

Password: #{No. of Employees(Lead)}${Number of PCs(Lead)}*

 

If you have any question or encounter any problems logging in, please contact me at {Consultant Email}.

Sincerely,

{Licensing Consultant New(Lead)}

{ Title(Licensing Consultant New(User))}

E-mail: {Email 2(Licensing Consultant New (User))}

Phone: {Other Phone(Licensing Consultant New (User))}

{logo}

 

“All information supplied shall be handled by Microsoft in accordance with the security protocols required to avoid loss or deviation, and in compliance with international regulation of privacy and personal data.”

data.name: ForgetPassMessage
data.value: Type your Email below and click “Send”. You will receive a new email with your password.

data.name: ForgetPassValidationMessage
data.value: You don't have a Microsoft Deployment Summary created in this site for this user name. Please verify your email address or search your email to find out if you received instructions from Microsoft to access this application.

data.name: BodyTextAffidavitParticipation
data.value:
Dear {ConsultantName}

The Company {CompanyName} identified with the lead ID {LeadId} has confirmed their interest in participating in the campaign {SourceCampaign}. This confirmation was received at {Hora} on {Fecha}

Sincerely,

 

SOMSight Automatically Notication

data.value: {CompanyName} decide to participate in the campaign
